blogPost.excerpt: Host a listening party, hang with friends or meet new people while listening to great music and building playlists together. Let’s make the internet a little less quiet. Come say hi.
blogPost.body: Host a listening party, hang with friends or meet new people while listening to great music and building playlists together. Let’s make the internet a little less quiet. Come say hi.
blogPost.title: Roadtrip - Good tunes, good friends, good vibes.
blogPost.author: Harry Stebbings

localize.description: 举办一个聆听派对，和朋友一起闲逛，或者结识新朋友，一起听好音乐，一起建立播放列表。让我们把互联网弄得安静一点。过来打个招呼。
localize.tagline: 好的曲调，好的朋友，好的共鸣。

localize.description: 舉辦一個聆聽派對，和朋友一起閒逛，或者結識新朋友，一起聽好音樂，一起建立播放列表。讓我們把互聯網弄得安靜一點。過來打個招呼。
localize.tagline: 好的曲調，好的朋友，好的共鳴。

previous.excerpt: Does a bad backdrop mean your video calls, virtual dates and zoom meetings are letting the team down? Is your virtual backdrop failing to impress? The Work-From-Home Backdrop installs in seconds and instantly transforms your space into a dynamic domain.
previous.title: The Work From Home Backdrop - Physical backdrop for video calls and Zoom meetings

localize.description: 糟糕的背景是否意味着你的视频通话、虚拟约会和缩放会议让团队失望了？你的虚拟背景没有给人留下深刻印象吗？在家工作背景只需几秒钟即可安装，并立即将您的空间转变为动态域。
localize.tagline: 视频通话和缩放会议的物理背景

localize.description: 糟糕的背景是否意味着你的視頻通話、虛擬約會和縮放會議讓團隊失望了？你的虛擬背景沒有給人留下深刻印象嗎？在家工作背景只需幾秒鐘即可安裝，並立即將您的空間轉變爲動態域。
localize.tagline: 視頻通話和縮放會議的物理背景
